amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete section 634 which consolidates the vice presidential residence utility costs at the Naval Observatory with other activities of the Department of the Navy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 634 from the bill. Section 634 authorizes the Navy to pay the utility bills, including the electric bill, for the vice-president's residence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 285 (Roll no. 268).
